SA02n2963:1: dānaṁ gomayamambunā ca sahitaṁ śīlaṁ ca saṁmārjanam śānti-kṣudra-pippalikā panayanaṁ vīryaṁ kriyāpasthāpanam |
SA02n2963:2: dhyānaṁ tatkṣaṇamekacittakaraṇaṁ prajñā surekhojjvalā etāḥ pāramitāḥ ṣaḍeva labhate kṛtvā munermaṇḍalam | 1 |
SA02n2963:6: ṣaṭpāramitāpūraṇena vinā na buddhatvaṁ siddhatvaṁ ca bhavati |
SA02n2963:8: uktaṁ ca bhagavatā yasminpakṣe - na mantrajāpo na tapo na homo na maṇḍaleyaṁ na ca maṇḍalaṁ ca |
SA02n2963:9: sa mantrajāpaḥ sa japaḥ sa homaḥ tanmaṇḍaleyaṁ tanmaṇḍalaṁ ca ||
SA02n2963:13: punarapyuktam - na buddho labhyate'nyatra lokadhātuṣu kutracit |
SA02n2963:14: cittameva hi saṁbuddho na buddho'nyatra darśitaḥ ||
SA02n2963:17: cittaṁ śuddhyati niyataṁ tāvadācaret ityadikaṁ, na vande( t )
SA02n2963:20: dhīmān devān na tad vandet kāṣṭhapāṣāṇamṛṇmayān |
SA02n2963:43: kiṁ falaṁ atha cet tatrāpi pāramitā trividhā smṛtā |
SA02n2963:50: uktaṁ ca hevajre- śarīraṁ dānaṁ datvā tu paścāccaryāṁ samārabhet |
SA02n2963:57: nirālaṁbinyāḥ pāramitāpakṣaiḥ ṣaṇṇāṁ dānaṁ saṁjñādīnāṁ kiṁ dānaṁ iti |
SA02n2963:61: atha dīyate vā cāṇḍālikāṁ pañcagatikāṁ poṣaṇaṁ bodhicittadānaṁ etaddānaṁ iti |
SA02n2963:66: atha go avadhūtī nāḍīgāminīti tena dvāreṇa pariṇāmayatītyarthaḥ |
SA02n2963:67: ambunā ca śītāṁśudhāradravaṁ mahāsukhacakrasthaṁ tenāmbunā sahitaṁ yugmam |
SA02n2963:68: sahamarṣaṇe ekīkṛtaṁ cāṇḍālyā saha śaśirūpatvena saṁmiśrī bhūtam |
SA02n2963:69: uktaṁ ca śrīhevajre- nābhau dahati caṇḍālī dahati pañcatathāgatān |
SA02n2963:70: dahati ca locanādīḥ dagdhehaṁ sravate śaśī |
SA02n2963:73: kiṁ tat śīlaṁ śīlasamādhau samādhi samidhi ekacittakaraṇamityarthaḥ |
SA02n2963:75: sato vastuno mārjanaṁ sṛjo śuddho sato ( sajo )
SA02n2963:79: saha saṁyoge śūnyatāḥ karūṇā cekatā sukṣāntiḥ |
SA02n2963:82: kṣudraṁ bodhicittaṁ ca kṣudramamṛtaṁ śuddhā iti nyāyāt |
SA02n2963:88: pipīlikā nāḍī lalanā tayā apanayanaṁ kṣudrapipīlikāpanayanaṁ bodhicittamāsvādanamityarthaḥ |
SA02n2963:90: anuttarasamyaksaṁbodhigata cittasvabhāvakaṁ lalanā prajñāsvarūpaṁ ca bodhicittamupāyakam |
SA02n2963:96: kriyāhetudharmā yeṣu dharmadhātusvarūpāḥ tasyāḥ tantrārabhyamāṇamiti kriyā upasthānaṁ samīkaraṇaṁ sādaranirantrakālaṁ mārgābhyāsāt |
SA02n2963:104: prajñāsurekhojjvalā śobhanarekhā surekhā vidyutchaṭākāreṇa yā rekhā |
SA02n2963:105: sā bhagavatī caṇḍālī nābhimaṇḍalasthitā sā bhagavatī mahāmudrā parikalpitā |
SA02n2963:108: adhimātrasattvānāṁ prajñāpāramitā-pūraṇena sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ pūritā bhavati iti nyāyā |
SA02n2963:109: taduktaṁ- prajñāpāramitāyām- “evameva subhūte mahāyānaṁ mahāyānamiti“ ( aṣṭasāhasrikāprajñāpāramitā,
SA02n2963:113: pṛ0 385 - 391 yathā kāyasyāntaṁ nopalabhyate madhyaṁ nopalabhyate,
SA02n2963:119: mahāyānañca prajñāpāramitāsvarūpā prajñāpāramitāṁ hi śruticintā- bhāvanāyāḥ pāramitā gateti |
SA02n2963:120: prajñāpāramitā dharmadhātusvarūpā tasyā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sarva pāramitāḥ paripuritā bhavanti |
